inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of AMD with choroidal neovascularization (CNV) in one eye
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal or dry AMD of any grade in the second eye
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to maintain AREDS vitamin supplements throughout the study, or remain off these supplements for the duration of the study, if not taking them prior to the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any current use of L-DOPA containing medication or dopamine agonist medication, or any planned use of any of these agents, except for study medication, during the study
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent use of monoamine oxidase (MAO) inhibitors
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease, which is a significant orthostatic hypotension and neurologic condition that can impair vision. He is currently taking Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl.
